name: Shinobi Strike
description:
Shinobi Strike is a retro Japanese style 1 v 1 fighting game. The game is supposed to imitate street fighter like games. There are two character which you and a friend will play as. The character on the left, the blue ninja will attack slower but has more health, where as, the ninja on the right will attack faster but does less damage. 

The controls...

BLUE NINJA

W - jump

A - left

D - right

E - attack

RED NINJA

^ - jump

< - left

> - right

ctrl - attack

Have fun and thank you for downloading my game.
